name: Adobo
description: A popular Filipino dish made with chicken or pork, marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices.

name: Sinigang
description: A sour soup made with pork, shrimp, or fish, and flavored with tamarind.

name: Lechon
description: A whole roasted pig, known for its crispy skin and tender meat.

name: Halo-Halo
description: A popular Filipino dessert made with crushed ice, evaporated milk, and various ingredients such as sweetened beans, fruits, and jellies.

name: San Miguel Beer
description: A popular Filipino beer known for its smooth and refreshing taste.
